description: The Yellow Camellia (Camellia petelotii var. petelotii) is an amazing plant species. This striking evergreen shrub bursts into life in the spring, with its single-petalled, bright yellow flowers adding a memorable splash of color to any garden. The petals have an almost waxy texture and the large yellow blooms contrast wonderfully against the glossy, dark green leaves. The hardiness of the Yellow Camellia makes it a great choice for a low-maintenance garden that has seasonal appeal. It also forms a beautiful backdrop for any outdoor space and is perfect for adding a bit of flair to a patio or balcony.
